channel.title: Plz come and look on mine scar error
channel.description:
ok i open script powerchoooper klick next......now i drag on to mine rs window and play but it write this:
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
please help! :(

item.title: Plz come and look on mine scar error
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:3, topic:12938”]^^Incorrect, that is an old version.

Go to www.villu-reborn.com to download SRL 3.2[/quote]

Oh god! Sorry about that I didnt know they released 3.2 yet

Read full topic

item.title: Plz come and look on mine scar error
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

Ok first, Download the SRL Library here http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/SRLv300.RAR

Once you have done that extract all the files into your includes section and into a folder called SRL.

Then your done
